title: Deep Purple 9 Albums SACD Remasters [ 24bit FLAC ]
description:
################################################
# Stereo { SACD / DVDA }                       #
# 24bit 96Khz/88.2 or 48 { Depending on Album }#
# FLAC Level 6                                 #  
################################################


These albums have been ripped from SACD and DVDA in full quality using foo_input_sacd and foo_input_dvda

Essentially this is the same as this below torrent which provides encoded iso's:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9956900/Deep_Purple_10_Albums_1970-1975_DVD-A_SACD_Remasters" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9956900/Deep_Purple_10_Albums_1970-1975_DVD-A_SACD_Remasters</a>

In this torrent the tracks are encoded into flac with all the SACD and DVDA proprietary removed while maintaining full fidelity.

The tracks and albums in this torrent have been split/tagged properly and the album art updated and imbedded into each track.

Also the "Dark Side of the moon" version has been replaced with the Linn Records SACD remaster which is the best rendition available today.
